-- | AVR Crosspack actions for shake build systems.

@package avr-shake
@version 0.0.1.1

module System.Command.AVRDUDE
data MemType
Calibration :: MemType
EEPROM :: MemType
EFuse :: MemType
Flash :: MemType
Fuse :: MemType
HFuse :: MemType
LFuse :: MemType
Lock :: MemType
Signature :: MemType
FuseN :: !Integer -> MemType
Application :: MemType
AppTable :: MemType
Boot :: MemType
ProdSig :: MemType
UserSig :: MemType
OtherMemType :: !String -> MemType
data Dir
In :: Dir
Out :: Dir
data Op dir
R :: Op Out
V :: Op Out
W :: Op In
data Format dir t
IHex :: Format dir FilePath
SRec :: Format dir FilePath
Raw :: Format dir FilePath
Immediate :: Format In [Word8]
Auto :: Format dir FilePath
Dec :: Format Out FilePath
Hex :: Format Out FilePath
Oct :: Format Out FilePath
Bin :: Format Out FilePath
data ActionsM t
type Actions = ActionsM ()
action :: MemType -> Op dir -> t -> Format dir t -> Actions
r :: MemType -> FilePath -> Actions
v :: MemType -> FilePath -> Actions
w :: MemType -> FilePath -> Actions
imm :: MemType -> [Word8] -> Actions
encodeActions :: Actions -> [String]
actionFiles :: Actions -> ([FilePath], [FilePath])
avrdude :: [String] -> Actions -> IO ExitCode
instance Monad ActionsM
instance Functor ActionsM
instance Applicative ActionsM
instance Monoid t => Monoid (ActionsM t)

module Development.Shake.AVR
avr_gcc :: [String] -> FilePath -> String -> Action ()
avr_gcc' :: String -> [String] -> FilePath -> String -> Action ()
avr_ld :: [String] -> [FilePath] -> String -> Action ()
avr_ld' :: String -> [String] -> [FilePath] -> String -> Action ()

avr_objcopy' :: String -> String -> [String] -> FilePath -> String -> Action ()
avr_objdump :: FilePath -> FilePath -> Action ()
